DOC.detailed_description: - This study involve one-time , MRI-guided bone marrow biopsy . Prior procedure , patient need bone scan perform within last three month PSA blood test drawn within one month registration study . - Patients also required participate DFCI research study `` Collection Specimens Clinical Data Patients Prostate Cancer High Risk Prostate Cancer '' .
DOC.criteria: Histologic diagnosis prostate cancer Bone scan consistent suspicious metastatic prostate cancer within last three month Platelet count > 50,000/ul PT aPTT < 1.5 x control At least one week remove take aspirin coumadin Currently participate protocol `` Collection Specimens Clinical Data Patients Prostate Cancer High Risk Prostate Cancer '' Devices incompatible MR study ( e.g . pacemaker , ear implant , etc . )
